summary: This is an email from an analyst (sender name redacted) to an unspecified group, attaching a summary/analysis of Epstein trust documents. The email references an Excel spreadsheet with tabs for each trust, amendments, and summary information, building on previous 2019 analysis.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The email and attached analysis concern trust documents related to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating financial/estate planning structures.

events.title: Previous Epstein trust analysis
events.description: The analyst references having done a previous analysis of Epstein trusts in 2019, which is incorporated into the current document.

keyFacts: An analyst compiled a detailed summary/analysis of Epstein trust documents into an Excel spreadsheet (Epstein_Trust_Analysis_v5.xlsx).
The analysis includes tabs for each trust, chronological amendments, and summary/key information.
The document builds upon a previous trust analysis conducted in 2019.
The email sender's name is redacted (only 'p.s.' initials visible), indicating internal or privileged communication about Epstein's financial structures.
